external_games.name: Scooby-Doo DVD Game: Funland of Freaky Frights

name: Scooby-Doo DVD Game: Funland of Freaky Frights
summary: Scooby-Doo needs viewers' help to solve a spooky mystery in this interactive program. Is Funland amusement park really haunted--or is some masked mastermind really pulling the strings? With remote control in hand, viewers become honorary members of Mystery Incorporated, helping the gang through a series of fun challenges to discover the truth. Up to four player can play this game.
